DOC.brief_summary: This exploratory study compare activity safety 400 patient previously untreated metastatic carcinoma colon treat UFOX ( combination regimen UFT® ( Tegafur plus Uracil ) , Oxaliplatin , Folinic Acid ) plus Cetuximab FOLFOX-4 ( combination regimen 5 Fluorouracil ( 5-FU ) , Oxaliplatin Folinic Acid ) plus Cetuximab )
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety FOLFOX-4 Plus Cetuximab Versus UFOX Plus Cetuximab .
